name: FunnerVids.com
overview:
Need a video that explains your product, service or crowdfunding campaign? We make fun, inexpensive, animated videos that will wow your customers.

Lots of businesses can’t afford to pay thousands and thousands of dollars for a powerful video. FunnerVids are fast, fun videos that work just as effectively as those over-produced $20,000 videos. If you can afford to pay that much, then go for it! But honestly, there’s really no need to go overboard and pay that much, is there?

We’ll make you a video to help promote whatever business or project you need, and we’ll do it fast, and for a fair price.

Businesses – Explain your product or service and get your customer’s attention in less than two minutes

Crowdfunders – “We know that to have a video as part of your campaign, you raise 114 percent more money than if you don’t have a video. – Inc.com”

Authors – Create a fast, fun book trailer

Marketers – Promote your latest service or information product

Contests – Get attention for your latest giveaway
